page.title: 13CHASE SIDE NURSERIES
page.content: The nurseries have 14 greenhouses.They grow cress and beansprouts.Cress starts off in incubators.Later they are greened off in greenhouses.They grow in compost and take 7 days to grow.They use 6750 ltrs of water a week . Beansprouts are grown in hot rooms and take 5 days to grow.There have been nurseries in Gt. Leighs for 42 years. Workers start at 6am and finish between 1-6pm.they sell Cress and beansprouts to primary and secondary wholesalers.Produce is sent as far as Cardiff,but mostly around East Anglia. They have 9 lorries but have a fleet of 15 vehicles altogether.
